title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Digital Storytelling Design and Operation for Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Digital storytelling projects based on science content can be designed following the 5 phases of the ADDIE model
Educationally meaningful science narratives can be planned and produced in VR/simulation environments
Summative evaluation tools can be applied to assess the effectiveness of digital storytelling learning
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
